content.prompt: Which of the following claims is best supported by the evidence provided by the article?

choices.label: Frog populations may increase in size as a result of the changes in male vocalizations.
Female frogs are beginning to prefer male frogs with higher pitched calls.
More experienced male frogs are no longer preferred by female frogs.
Frog populations may decrease in size as a result of males changing the pitch of their calls.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Describe the author's reasoning (use of evidence to support a claim).
